CustomObject.description:
Driver for DdMultiSelectPicklist lwc component
Usage: <c-dd-multi-select-picklist unique-identifier="<Any Unique String within app/parent component>" custom-search-name="<Developer name of a record in this CMT>"></c-dd-multi-select-picklist>
